channel.title: Codecademy
channel.description:
Was reading a blog and this guy mentioned Codecademy and it seems to be a really good source for learning some languages.
http://www.codecademy.com/tracks/javascript
Has anyone heard of it before or tried it out?

item.title: Codecademy
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Aetoc, post:9, topic:535100”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=653903.msg4380480#msg4380480 date=1383347811]
I was stuck on one part for JavaScript, the damn hint wasn’t helping… -.-
[/quote]

Yeah the hints are horrid when it gets further.[/quote]
It had something to do with variables and I did the tutorial before correctly but after that one, I didn’t know how the Hell to do and like I said, the hints are pretty damn bad at that point so yeah lmao.

Read full topic

item.title: Codecademy
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:3, topic:535100”]Personally, I have used CodeSchool to learn some HTML5 and RoR. It was great, I learned them pretty quickly. There are videos to watch, and a interactive tutorial that asks you questions. Although it’s seemingly based around web languages, it may not be what you’re looking for.[/quote]rofl html5 is so 2008

Read full topic

item.title: Codecademy
item.dc:creator: @Kiryn Kiryn
item.description:
@Kiryn wrote:

I did it as well. It’s a good place to get started but you won’t become a guru just by completing the courses

Read full topic

I used it to learn Web Development a little.

item.title: Codecademy
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Lol. I’ve been using this Javascript tutorial that you directly linked us to and learned a few things already, oh me.

Read full topic

item.title: Codecademy
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Personally, I have used CodeSchool to learn some HTML5 and RoR. It was great, I learned them pretty quickly. There are videos to watch, and a interactive tutorial that asks you questions. Although it’s seemingly based around web languages, it may not be what you’re looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: Codecademy
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yes, I’ve heard of it but didn’t know whether or not it’s a reliable source to learn a few languages I was interested in.

Read full topic
